QuestData.Title: Puzzling Cryptogram
QuestData.Description:
<The markings on each side of the cube periodically switch positions.
Ve'nari will be interested in this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Puzzling Cryptogram to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Ve'nari laughs as she appraises the cryptogram.>
This... is a children's toy. Brokers use them to teach their cartel's encryption methods.
Not to say that this is worthless. Quite the contrary. In a place such of this, even a glimmer of mirth is valuable beyond measure.
